overview: Elder Dalton has always been young for his age. His parents were especially good at protecting him from the vices and sins of the world. But this blessing of innocence has ill-prepared him for the temptations of the world. Now, fresh out on his mission, he's terribly naive, having no concept of sex, not even masturbation! The Brethren see a rare opportunity in this young, virginal Mormon. He is handsome, disciplined, and ready to be molded to their liking. Every sensation is new, and every fantasy is yet to be formed. And they know that, like most boys, he'll beg them to teach him more once he gets a taste of the true pleasure.
title: Elder Dalton: Chapters 1-4
